citeinfo.title: Alaskan Heavyweights: Bull Walruses of Round Island

abstract.p: The popular place to spend the summer, if you're a walrus, is a tiny island with a few rocky beaches. No wonder there's lot of pushing and shoving.
A photographic essay of walruses on Round Island, Bristol Bay, Alaska.
[Reference: Hansen, Paul G. 1979. Alaskan heavyweights: Bull walruses of Round Island. Pacific Search Vol. 13 No. 5. pp.5-7.]
This volume may be found at many university libraries.

descript.purpose: A report on bull walruses of Round Island, Alaska.
